content.question: Which of the following examples constitutes a use of asymmetrical meter?

choices.label: The figure presents one measure of music in a rhythmic clef. The time signature is 9/8.

content.answer: The figure presents one measure of music in a rhythmic clef. The time signature is 9/8.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Use symbols and terms to describe features of rhythm in notated music, including meter, note values, and rhythmic patterns and devices.
